00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <avr/io.h>
00025 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00026 #include "usart.h"
00027 #include "board.h"
00028 
00030 #define OCR0_1MS 14
00031 
00033 void init_usart_computer(void) {
00034         usart1_init(7,1);
00035         fdevopen((void*)usart1_transmit, (void*)usart1_receive_loopback);
00036         
00037         printf("openASC started\n");
00038 }
00039 
00041 void init_usart(void) {
00042         //Init the USART between the uC to run at 19.2 kbaud
00043         usart0_init(47);
00044 }
00045 
00051 void init_timer_0(void) {
00052         TCCR0A = 0;
00053         TCCR0A = (1<<WGM01) | (0<<WGM00);
00054         TCCR0B = (0<<WGM02) | (1<<CS02) | (0<<CS01) | (1<<CS00);        //Prescaler 1024
00055         TCNT0 = 0;
00056         OCR0A = OCR0_1MS;       /* match in aprox 1 ms,  */
00057         TIMSK0 |= (1<<OCIE0A);  //enable the interrupt
00058 }
00059 
00062 void init_timer_2(void) {
00063         TCNT2 = 0;
00064         TCCR2A = (1<<WGM21) | (0<<WGM20); //Normal operation, toggle on compare, prescale clk/64        
00065         TCCR2B = (0<<WGM22) | (1<<CS22) | (0<<CS21) | (0<<CS20);
00066         OCR2A = 30;     //Will run the timer at 130us intervals
00067         TIMSK2 |= (1<<OCIE2A);
00068 }
00069 
00072 void init_ports(void) {
00073         /* Check the file board.h for info about ports */
00074         DDRA = 0xFF;
00075         DDRB = 0xD6;
00076         DDRC = 0xD7;
00077         DDRD = 0x5B;
00078         DDRE = 0x26;
00079         //DDRE = 0x24;
00080         DDRF = 0xFF;
00081         DDRG = 0x20;
00082         DDRH = 0xAA;
00083         DDRJ = 0x8A;
00084         DDRK = 0xBF;
00085         DDRL = 0xAA;
00086         
00087         PORTH |= (1<<1);        //Set USART port high so we don't send continoulsy out on the bus
00088         PORTH |= (1<<0); //Pull up for the USART
00089         
00090         //Set pullups enabled for all the button inputs
00091         PORTC |= (1<<BUTTON_ROTATE_BIT);
00092         PORTC |= (1<<BUTTON_TXRX_BIT);
00093         PORTD |= (1<<BUTTON_RXANT_BIT);
00094         PORTD |= (1<<BUTTON_SUBMENU_BIT);
00095         PORTK |= (1<<BUTTON_MENU_BIT);
00096         PORTL |= (1<<BUTTON1_TX_BIT) | (1<<BUTTON2_TX_BIT) | (1<<BUTTON3_TX_BIT) | (1<<BUTTON4_TX_BIT);
00097         PORTH |= (1<<BUTTON1_RX_BIT) | (1<<BUTTON2_RX_BIT) | (1<<BUTTON3_RX_BIT);
00098         PORTB |= (1<<BUTTON4_RX_BIT);
00099         PORTG |= (1<<BUTTON_PULSE_BIT) | (1<<BUTTON_AUX1_BIT) | (1<<BUTTON_AUX2_BIT);
00100         
00101         PORTE = 0x03;
00102 }
00103 
00105 void init_backlight(void) {
00106         //Start PWM on PB7
00107         TCCR1A = (1<<COM1C1) | (0<<COM1C0) | (0<<WGM11) | (1<<WGM10);
00108         TCCR1B = (0<<WGM13) | (1<<WGM12) | (0<<CS12) | (1<<CS11) | (0<<CS10);
00109         TCCR1C = 0;
00110         OCR1CH = 0;
00111         OCR1CL = 0xC8;
00112 }
